snippet: Jack Abramoff, the former lobbyist who went to federal prison for corruption, is going to be the host of a new talk radio show to offer advice on reforming politics.
abstract: Jack Abramoff, former lobbyist who went to federal prison for corruption, will host a talk radio show on Premiere Networks that will focus on reforming politics.
lead_paragraph: Jack Abramoff, the former lobbyist who went to federal prison for corruption, is going to be the host of a new talk radio show to offer advice on reforming politics.

headline.main: Abramoff Gets His Own Radio Show
headline.print_headline: Abramoff Gets His Own Radio Show
